attributes.action: FUNDING RESEARCH INTO MOTOR NEURONE DISEASE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Funding of MND research. I would urge the goverment to put forward money into the research of this terrible disease,Only through Research can further lives be saved.Give money now and save lives in the future.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
